manda poshanayen thora mathu parapurak nirmanaya kirima ehi aramunaya.giya sathiye di jathika nidahas peramune deshapalana mandalaya araliya gaha mandiraye di janadhipathithuma hamuwiya.jathika nidahas peramune nayaka, idikirim, injineru sewa, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathya wimal wirawansha saha pakshaye pradhana lekam pi්rayanjith witharana, sampradayika karmantha ha kuda wyawasaya sanwardhana niyojya amathya wirakumara disanayaka, hitapu sanskruthika katayuthu amathya piyasiri wijenayaka, hitapu parlimenthu manthri jayantha samarawira, sabaragamu palath sabha manthri dipal gunasekara, kolambaa maha nagara sabha manthri mohomad musammil, nithignya kapila gamage, homagama pradeshiya sabhawe manthrini priyanga kothalawala yana deshapalana mandala sabhikawaru eeta ekwa sitiyaha.jathika nidahas peramuna wisin pasugiya dinawala “idam polis balathala sahithawa uthure chanda epa!”
